extra.enrollment_requirement: EXCLUSION  No more than 3.0 units from MUSC101/3.0; 204/3.0

basic.description:
The history of Western art music from the Middle Ages to 1750. The course focuses on musical styles, genres, and composers, as well as historical and social contextual considerations. 
NOTE    Students registered in a MUSC Plan (other than the MUSC Minor/General) should not register in this course.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Western Music: Early Christianity to J.S. Bach
